description: A cinematic, interactive Next.js-based website for the DJ collective PB&J Sounds, combining immersive visuals, music reactivity, and interactive content presentation.

entry_flow.step_1: Landing page shows looping TouchDesigner or video background.
entry_flow.step_2: Background audio (rotating PB&J sets) plays with low-pass filter.
entry_flow.step_3: ‘ENTER’ button triggers shader dissolve and audio unfilter via Tone.js.
entry_flow.step_4: Main content fades in with continuous vertical scroll.

sections.name: Landing
features: ‘ENTER’ button that dissolves liquid glass overlay
Audio unfilter and scroll reveal on enter

sections.name: EPK Scroll Section
features: Linear vertical scroll with parallax motion
Bios and role cards for PB&J members

sections.name: Demo Submission Section
features: Upload form: name, email, message, audio file
Upload via Vercel Blob Storage with progress indicator
POST to /api/submit-demo with Resend email trigger
Animated glass dissolve and success modal on submit
Dark HTML email with logo, info, and track link

audio_visual_behavior.global_audio: PB&J set rotation drives shader FFT reactivity on landing/main scroll.
audio_visual_behavior.shader_behavior: GLSL liquid-glass distortion intensity scales with average FFT amplitude.
audio_visual_behavior.demo_section_audio: Fades out background mix; FFT switches to uploaded demo preview.
audio_visual_behavior.visual_transition: Reverts back to PB&J mix visuals after scrolling up from demo section.

effects: Dissolve animation triggered by ENTER and demo submission
shader_details.fallback: For low-end or mobile devices, use blurred video background instead of shader.

api_routes./api/upload-url: Generates Vercel Blob signed upload URL.
api_routes./api/submit-demo: Sends submission email via Resend with uploaded file link.

design_style.mood: Immersive and cinematic like a live set intro

deployment_targets: Vercel Edge Functions for fast streaming

enhancements_roadmap: Add FFT-based fluid simulation shader (beat-driven distortion).
Bundle into GitHub-ready repo with README, assets, and docs.
goal: Generate the full, working PB&J Sounds website with all described interactions, backend API routes, and shader-based visuals ready to deploy on Vercel.
